description: Discover the best hotels in Adelaide, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Adelaide Stay near Rundle Street with Daily Breakfast & Rooftop Garden
hotels.description: Nestled in Adelaide’s vibrant East End, the Majestic Roof Garden Hotel offers an exceptional stay with breathtaking rooftop garden views. On one side, enjoy sweeping vistas of the rolling Adelaide Hills, while the other reveals the twinkling lights of the city’s lively streets. The hotel’s Culshaws restaurant celebrates fresh, local produce, complemented by an exclusive wine list featuring selections from renowned regions like the Barossa Valley, McLaren Vale and the Adelaide Hills. Perfectly located within walking distance of Rundle Mall, Adelaide Zoo, the National Wine Centre, the Art Gallery of South Australia, Adelaide Oval and the Botanic Gardens, the hotel offers easy access to the city’s top attractions.

hotels.title: Five-Star Sofitel Stay in the Heart of Adelaide CBD with Onsite Dining & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience five-star elegance at this luxurious Sofitel stay in the heart of South Australia’s vibrant capital. Located moments from the River Torrens and Rundle Mall, the hotel invites easy exploration. Discover laneways filled with top eateries, trendy boutiques and must-see galleries. Beyond the city, world-class wine regions and sandy beaches offer a change of pace. Each room features a contemporary take on French sophistication in signature Sofitel style, complemented by exceptional facilities. Savour French-inspired cuisine at Garçon Bleu, enjoy a glass of champagne at Déjà Vu or unwind in the lap pool on level five while taking in the city skyline.

hotels.title: Contemporary Peppers Luxury in the Heart of Adelaide with Onsite Restaurant & Indoor Heated Pool
hotels.description: Discover South Australia’s cosmopolitan capital city as you indulge in quintessential Peppers luxury in the heart of Adelaide's CBD. Start your days at the elegant TUTTO Cucina + Bar, serving up elevated Italian cuisine and located right inside the hotel. Or, if your escape calls for relaxation, retreat to the hotel's inviting heated indoor pool with a spa and sauna for the ultimate Adelaide bliss. Whether you are a culture vulture, a foodie or a sports lover, Adelaide has it all - and Peppers Waymouth Hotel will take you right to the heart of it. Within walking distance, explore sites such as the Art Gallery of South Australia, or catch a game at Adelaide Oval. Do as the locals do, and head to Peel Street for your cocktail fix or complete your Adelaide trip with a visit to the lush Adelaide Hills.

hotels.title: Beachside Glenelg Apartment Escape Just 20 Minutes from Adelaide CBD
hotels.description: With shimmering waters stretching as far as the eye can see, and the bustling high street brimming with delicious cafes and charming boutiques - experience the best of South Australia's coastal charm with a beachside Glenelg stay. Just 20 minutes from Adelaide CBD, Glenelg feels like a different world, with beachfront dining, palm-lined walkways and a thriving nightlife scene. When you're not making footprints in the sand along the beach or exploring the many eateries along the bustling Jetty Road, take a dip in your hotel's heated indoor swimming pool or soak in the bubbling jacuzzi. Afterwards, return to your apartment sanctuary, where thoughtful amenities create a home-away-from-home experience.

hotels.title: Adelaide CBD Apartment Escape within North Terrace Culture Precinct
hotels.description: Adelaide's buzzing urban scene is bubbling with multicultural food outlets, a vibing live-music scene and a packed festival calendar - and all of this can be enjoyed from Oaks Adelaide Horizons Suites, located in the heart of the CBD. This stylish, apartment-style hotel is located along North Terrace, the hub for culture and arts. Right up the street, you'll discover the Art Gallery of South Australia, the National War Memorial, theatres, cinemas and the iconic Trinity Church. When you're not exploring Adelaide's sights, cook yourself dinner in your self-contained apartment or take a dip in the refreshing indoor swimming pool.

hotels.title: Boutique Heritage Escape in Heart of CBD near Adelaide Central Market
hotels.description: You're perfectly placed to explore the best of South Australia’s lively capital with a stay at the elegant Adina Apartment Hotel Adelaide Treasury, housed within one of the state’s most historic buildings. Refreshingly modern apartments and studios offer a welcoming home-away-from-home feeling, while the conveniences of an indoor pool, gym and onsite restaurant will elevate your stay to new levels of comfort. The location is nothing short of superb, with the famed Adelaide Central Market, Rundle Mall and an abundance of trendy wine bars and newly opened cafés all within walking distance. When you want to taste South Australia’s best drops straight from the source, Adelaide is the perfect base for day trips to the Barossa Valley, Adelaide Hills and McLaren Vale.

hotels.title: Stylish Central Adelaide Apartment Stay
hotels.description: Find yourself placed in Adelaide's vibrant west end when you stay at the homely Franklin Apartments. These self-contained apartments offer a home-away-from-home feeling, with each room offering fabulous facilities, including fully equipped kitchens and laundry services. Adelaide Oval, Rundle Mall and the buzzing Adelaide Central Markets are all within 10 minutes and the world-renowned wineries of Adelaide Hills and the picturesque shores of Glenelg are less than 30 minutes away.

hotels.vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Adelaide City Centre
hotels.title: Sophisticated Adelaide West End Escape
hotels.description: Striking the perfect balance between sophisticated comfort and an unbeatable location, Holiday Inn Express Adelaide City Centre, an IHG Hotel, is an idyllic city break in the vibrant West End. Situated in the heart of the buzzing CBD and a short stroll from Adelaide’s premier shopping mall and historic Italianate arcades, this stylish launchpad is perfectly placed with the best wining, dining and entertainment the city has to offer at its doorstep.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Adelaide Escape with Suspended Bridge Pool
hotels.description: Escape to South Australia's vibrant and multicultural capital with a stay at Vibe Hotel Adelaide. This stylish and modern hotel enjoys a prime position in the heart of the City of Churches, famous for being the only capital city entirely surrounded by parklands. Spend days exploring the city, tasting some of Australia's best drops in the nearby wine regions, or relaxing on golden beaches, before returning to your urban haven to enjoy brand-new facilities or relax by the innovative suspended pool.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Adelaide City Retreat Overlooking South Terrace Parklands
hotels.description: Overlooking the serene green of the city’s rolling parklands, Hotel Alba Adelaide offers guests a resort-style stay right in the heart of the city's vibrant South Terrace. Boasting 99 stylish guest rooms, each boasting a spacious private balcony and coffee machine, this minimalist-chic hotel blends the charm of an elegant countryside retreat with the convenience of an urban escape. Head to historic Central Market for foodie delights or nearby Himeji Garden for a slice of traditional Japan in Adelaide.

hotels.title: Chic Adelaide Art Series Self-Contained Suites Overlooking Adelaide Hills with Lap Pool
hotels.description: Indulge in the perfect blend of art and luxury at this boutique hotel, which champions the work of Aboriginal painter, Yannima Pikarli Tommy Watson. One of Adelaide’s coolest city-fringe pads, with the leafy Walkerville Terrace shopping precinct on its doorstep and North Terrace’s cultural boulevard, dining institutions and in-the-know boutiques within easy reach, this is the ultimate urban retreat, overlooking the majestic Adelaide Hills. Admire the striking artwork of Watson and the vibrant colour splashes adorned on the walls, go for a swim in the lap pool, work up a sweat in the gym, or relax and unwind in your well-appointed suite or apartment. If you wish, you can venture out and explore the nearby Adelaide Botanic Garden and the bustling Adelaide Central Market, both a short drive away.

hotels.title: Stylish Adelaide City Break in Heart of the Vibrant East End with Stunning Views
hotels.description: Experience style and comfort at the Crowne Plaza Adelaide - a contemporary haven located in the city's vibrant East End. Step out of your modern accommodation and explore the array of attractions on your doorstep, from the iconic Rundle Mall to the vibrant dining and entertainment found only in the East End, or venture further afield to the world-class wineries of the McLaren Vale and Barossa Valley. After a day of sightseeing, return to the hotel to take in spectacular views of the city and the famed Adelaide Hills from South Australia's tallest building. Head to the level 10 social hub to enjoy the ultra-cool alfresco bar and watch the sun go down, beat the heat in the outdoor pool or grab a bite at the acclaimed Koomo restaurant for mouthwatering fare.

hotels.vendor_name: TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide
hotels.title: Stylish Central Adelaide Stay in the East End near Rundle Mall with Onsite Bar & Cafe
hotels.description: Indulge in a sophisticated urban escape at the chic TRYP by Wyndham Pulteney Street Adelaide, centrally located in the heart of Adelaide's CBD. This stylish retreat is a stone's throw from the city's vibrant East End, home to a cornucopia of gourmet eateries, boutique shops and the iconic Rundle Mall and Adelaide Central Market. Savour the city's unique nightlife, then unwind at the onsite Z Bar or grab a coffee at the Z Kitchen, all while embracing Adelaide's laid-back culture.

hotels.title: Adelaide Five-Star InterContinental Escape with Award-Winning Japanese Teppanyaki Restaurant
hotels.description: Take a luxurious escape to the five-star InterContinental Adelaide, located in the heart of the CBD. Towering above the banks of the Torrens River, this sleek hotel is home to Shiki, an award-winning Japanese teppanyaki restaurant, along with a 24-hour fitness centre and glistening outdoor pool. The Adelaide Festival Centre, Convention Centre, Casino and Adelaide Oval are all just steps from your front door, with famed wineries and crystal clear beaches a short drive away.

hotels.title: Five-Star Stamford Elegance in the Heart of Adelaide
hotels.description: Experience the magic of South Australia’s cosmopolitan capital with a stay at Stamford Plaza Adelaide. Let this sophisticated hotel be your elegant launchpad as you enjoy the finer things in life, with the best this vibrant city has to offer only a stone's throw away. Perfectly placed for those seeking a fun-filled escape, the hotel is within walking distance from Adelaide’s vibrant dining and entertainment scene, Adelaide Oval and Festival Centre.

hotels.title: Five-Star Stay within Iconic Adelaide Oval
hotels.description: A memorable stay awaits at the Oval Hotel, a bespoke property nestled within the walls of one of the city’s most iconic landmarks - Adelaide Oval. As Australia’s first stadium hotel, Oval Hotel offers guests a distinctly South Australian, one-of-a-kind accommodation experience and places sports lovers in the heart of the action. Perfectly positioned just moments from the endless urban delights, the hotel also boasts onsite fine-dining; Bespoke Wine Bar & Kitchen and Five Regions Restaurants.

hotels.title: Stylish Award-Winning Apartment Escape in the Heart of Adelaide
hotels.description: Discover an unforgettable self-contained urban escape at the top-rated, ultra-stylish Miller Apartments Adelaide, superbly located right in the city centre. Each recently renovated apartment boasts a dazzling array of top-notch facilities, including fully equipped kitchens and separate living areas. Explore Adelaide's brilliant collection of bars, restaurants and galleries, roam through exceptional shopping precincts and get a taste of world-class cultural experiences - all within metres of your doorstep.

hotels.title: Glenelg Apartment Escape Just 20 Minutes from Adelaide CBD with Oceanfront Location
hotels.description: Treat yourself to a South Australia beachside retreat at Oaks Glenelg Plaza Pier Suites, where spectacular ocean panoramas and contemporary facilities make for a memorable escape. Just 20 minutes away from Adelaide CBD, Glenelg feels like a different world, with beachfront dining, palm-lined walkways and a thriving nightlife scene. When you're not making footprints in the sand along the beach or exploring the many eateries along the bustling Jetty Road, take a dip in your hotel's heated indoor swimming pool or soak in the bubbling jacuzzi. Afterwards, return to your apartment sanctuary, where high-end amenities create a home-away-from-home experience.

hotels.title: Centrally-Located Adelaide Retreat near Rundle Mall & Convention Centre
hotels.description: Find yourself in the heart of it all with an elegant stay at this chic Adelaide city oasis perfectly situated on North Terrace, mere steps from the Convention Centre and the iconic Adelaide Oval. Be it for business or leisure, take advantage of the hotel's prime location and explore the enchanting South Australian capital to the fullest. Kick back and relax in the hotel's well-appointed rooms and suites, go cafe-hopping or tuck into pub classics at the famous Stonegrill. If you wish to venture further, the charming Barossa Valley and its renowned wineries are an hour away while closer to the hotel, head to Haigh's Chocolate Visitor Centre to learn all about the craft of chocolate-making and indulge in some retail therapy at Rundle Street Market.

hotels.title: Relaxing Adelaide CBD Escape Moments from Rundle Mall with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience the elegance of Adelaide with this ideally located hotel as your base. Perfectly positioned in the city's East End, you'll find yourself within a five-minute stroll of Rundle Mall shopping precinct and the the vibrant Rundle Street, home to a plethora of trendy bars, restaurants and boutiques. Venture further to explore the Adelaide Botanic Garden or the Art Gallery of South Australia. Back at the hotel, head to the onsite restaurant, DJ's Diner & Bar, for American-style comfort food and a refreshing drink.

hotels.title: Adelaide CBD Escape with Rooftop Terrace & Heated Lap Pool
hotels.description: Treat yourself to a lavish city escape at the glamorous Avani Adelaide Residences, ideally placed in the heart of the CBD. This urban retreat is spectacularly located on bustling Franklin Street, allowing you to walk to cool bars, award-winning restaurants and high-end shops. Fabulous facilities include a restaurant, heated lap pool, a rooftop terrace with outdoor barbecue and lounge, a gym complete with a steam room and sauna, a cinema, a library and even a golf simulator.

hotels.title: Stylish Adelaide Airport Stay with Stunning Views
hotels.description: Step off the plane and straight into the Festival State's charming western corner with a stay at Atura Adelaide Airport, Australia’s first and only seamless integration of a hotel and airport terminal. Just 15 minutes from Rundle Mall and moments from golden West Beach and the best of Glenelg, enjoy prime surf, cute cafés and boutique shops all within close reach. When you return from your adventures, relax over a coffee at the Meeting Point Café or refuel at the Hangar Bar & Grill.

hotels.title: Stamford Grand Adelaide Beachfront Escape Just 20 Minutes from Adelaide CBD
hotels.description: Experience the grandeur of the Stamford Grand Adelaide Hotel, a beachfront retreat on the shores of Adelaide's vibrant Glenelg Beach. With its unrivalled location in the heart of Glenelg, this renowned hotel offers an idyllic blend of coastal charm and city sophistication. Explore the bustling Jetty Road, brimming with boutique shops, or take a leisurely tram ride to Adelaide's city centre. After a day of exploration, retreat to the Horizon Cocktail Lounge, where you can soak in panoramic ocean views.

hotels.title: Heritage Glamour in the Heart of Adelaide with Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Experience grandeur, elegance and luxury in the heart of Adelaide at the Mayfair Hotel - a prestigious heritage-listed building steeped in history. The hotel boasts an unparalleled location where you can spend hours indulging in retail therapy at the nearby City Cross Mall or evenings spent meandering along Hindley Street. Or, retreat to the hotel and enjoy a glamorous High Tea at Mayflower Restaurant, or cocktails at Hennessy Rooftop Bar.

hotels.title: Stylish Adelaide Retreat with Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Escape to South Australia’s picturesque coastal cosmopolitan city with a stay in the eclectic Hotel Indigo Adelaide Markets, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly located in the heart of the market precinct, this retreat is the gateway to your gastronomic journey with the Adelaide Central Market right next door. Spend your days exploring, take a dip in the refreshing coastal waters, and indulge in locally sourced South Australian seafood at the sophisticated onsite restaurant and rooftop bar.

hotels.title: Central Adelaide Escape Overlooking Park Lands
hotels.description: Stay in a leafy corner of the CBD at The Terrace Hotel Adelaide, located on the verdant fringes of the sprawling Adelaide Park Lands. This stylish hotel offers soaring views over the greenery, while Mount Lofty and the patchwork vineyards of the Adelaide Hills are visible in the distance. Stop for a bite to eat at Terrace Bar & Kitchen and enjoy fresh local produce from the surrounding wine regions, before venturing out to explore South Australia's vibrant capital.

hotels.title: South Terrace City Break Overlooking the Adelaide Park Lands
hotels.description: Stay in a modern remake of the classic motel on the leafy fringes of the central Adelaide Park Lands at the HotelMOTEL Adelaide. Adelaide Oval, Rundle Mall and Adelaide Central Market are all within ten minutes of this cosy accommodation, and when you're done exploring, you'll find modern amenities and contemporary comfort in your room. Take it easy and order in-room dining or head to the Terrace Bar & Kitchen at the adjoining The Terrace Hotel for a sit-down feast.

hotels.title: Modern Pullman Stay in the Heart of Adelaide CBD with European-Inspired Restaurant & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: If you’re looking for a sophisticated central Adelaide city stay, look no further than this stylish East End escape. Perfectly poised moments from the buzz of the CBD, city parklands, and the bars and boutiques of the eclectic Rundle Street and Ebenezer Place, there’s plenty to discover beyond the hotel, but this luxury oasis will entice you to stay and enjoy. Pullman Adelaide offers guests a first-class experience. Treat yourself to European-inspired dining at PARC Brasserie & Bar. Enjoy the 24-hour fitness centre in addition to the restorative sauna and steam room, or start the day with some lengths in the indoor lap pool.
